Title: Monster in the Closet
Writer: Daniel J. Goor (created by), Michael Schur (created by), Andrew Guest, Phil Augusta Jackson (executive story editor), Tricia McAlpin (executive story editor), David Phillips (executive story editor), Justin Noble (executive story editor)

Plot: The Nine-Nine throws a wedding for Pimento and Rosa.
